item.title: Google Analytics
item.description: What is Google Analytics It is used to help you understand how your web site are accessing. With it, you can learn which part of your web is good, or bad; you can know how many user was/are accessing your web, where are they from….; then you can improve the website accordingly. It is also for Android app, and iOS app. The steps to use it login https://marketingplatform.google.com/about/analytics/
